argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | toycom.1 | |- C = { g e. Abel | ( Base ` g ) = CC } |
| 2 |  | toycom.2 | |- .+ = ( +g ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ssrab2 | |- { g e. Abel | ( Base ` g ) = CC } C_ Abel |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqsstri | |- C C_ Abel |
| 5 | 4 | #P_sseli | |- ( K e. C -> K e. Abel ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> K e. Abel ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( g = K -> ( Base ` g ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( g = K -> ( ( Base ` g ) = CC <-> ( Base ` K ) = CC ) ) |
| 10 | 9, 1 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( K e. C <-> ( K e. Abel /\ ( Base ` K ) = CC ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simprbi | |- ( K e. C -> ( Base ` K ) = CC ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( Base ` K ) = CC ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> A e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 15 | 14, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> B e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` K ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_ablcom | |- ( ( K e. Abel /\ A e. ( Base ` K ) /\ B e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( A ( +g ` K ) B ) = ( B ( +g ` K ) A ) ) |
| 19 | 6, 13, 15, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ( +g ` K ) B ) = ( B ( +g ` K ) A ) ) |
| 20 | 2 | #P_oveqi | |- ( A .+ B ) = ( A ( +g ` K ) B ) |
| 21 | 2 | #P_oveqi | |- ( B .+ A ) = ( B ( +g ` K ) A ) |
| 22 | 19, 20, 21 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( K e. C /\ A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A .+ B ) = ( B .+ A ) ) |
